---
title: "Covid-19 Lietuvos savivaldybėse"
output: 
  flexdashboard::flex_dashboard:
    vertical_layout: fill
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(htmltools)
library(flexdashboard)
library(dplyr)
```


```{r, echo = FALSE, results = 'asis'}
regs <- read.csv("../data/lt-covid19-individual.csv") %>% .$administrative_level_3 %>% unique %>% sort

regs_n <- paste0(gsub("[.]","",gsub(" ", "_",regs)),".html")

tags$h3("Savivaldybių sąrašas")

links <- paste0("regions/", regs_n)

tags$ul(mapply(function(nm, hr) tags$li(tags$a(href=hr, nm)),  regs, links, SIMPLIFY = FALSE))

```
